mapper.sql: id, older_id, older_name, applicant_name, relationship_id, phone_no, audit_flag, audit_result, auditor_id, audit_name, audit_time, cleared, note, send_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pension_drugreceive_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pension_drugreceive_record (id, older_id, older_name, applicant_name, relationship_id, phone_no, audit_flag, audit_result, auditor_id, audit_name, audit_time, cleared, note, send_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationshipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_id = #{record.olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.select:
select pd.id, pd.total_amount as totalAmount, pd.amount_total as amountTotal, pd.single_dose as singleDose, pd.unit as unit, dic.drugreceive_name as drugreceiveName, pd.morning_flag as morningFlag, pd.noon_flag as noonFlag, pd.night_flag as nightFLag, pd.before_after_flag as beforAfterFlag, pd.store_time as storeTIme, pd.use_flag as useFlag, pd.valid_flag as validFLag, pd.shelflife_time as shelflifeTime
from pension_drugreceive_detail pd, pension_drugreceive_record pr, pension_dic_drugreceive dic where pr.id=pd.record_id and dic.id=pd.drugreceive_id and pd.cleared=2 and pr.cleared=2 and dic.cleared=2 and dic.drugreceive_name=#{drugName} and pr.older_id=#{olderId}
